secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with traditional birthday celebrations can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "birthday cake" and "balloons".
I'll make a new guess. How about "party hats"?
Yes, you can bring party hats.
I'll make a new guess. How about "streamers"?

The secret rule seems to be that the items must be related to a celebration or party theme. Based on the provided examples ("birthday cake," "balloons," "party hats," and "streamers"), I would guess that the rule is: "Items that are typically associated with celebrations or parties are allowed."
